participant_1.background:
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
I want a home that is quiet and private, with plenty of space for my vintage cars.
My family is my favorite people on Earth, but I don't like when they mess up my organizing schemes.
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.
I am not a fashion diva, but I like to take care of my appearance.

participant_2.background:
I love the website The Spruce because it has so many great tips for cleaning everything in my home, including my glasses!
I have to be careful around my cat when I'm tending to my flower beds, because I've knocked over some pots of flowers in the past.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love animals and the outdoors.
I have no siblings and I would rather go swimming than worry about my appearance.
i like the movie godfather.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
How is your day going so far?
Good! Just finished reading a book about a bakery. I'm thinking about opening my own bakery someday.
Oh that's awesome! I manage a bakery right now. It's a lot of work, but I love it!
What kind of bakery do you have?
It's a small, family-owned bakery. We specialize in handmade pastries and breads.
That sounds delicious! I love pastries.
We have a few vegan options, too!
Oh that's great! I'm mostly vegan, so that's really important to me.
We also have a lot of gluten-free options. We try to make sure everyone can enjoy our pastries.
That's so great! I'm glad you're so inclusive.
We love to make everyone happy!
You sound like a great baker!
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of my work.
I bet you should be! What's your favorite thing to make?
I love making croissants! They're so flaky and delicious.
Oh my gosh, I love croissants!
I know, right? They're the best!
I think I'm going to have to stop by your bakery sometime soon!
You should! We'd love to have you!
Thanks! I'll definitely come by soon
